result: 120) In the early hours of March 11, 1978, parts of a Soviet rocket reentry in the atmosphere above the city of Rio de Janeiro and fell in the Atlantic Ocean. It was a beautiful spectacle, the numerous fragments entering ignition due to friction with the atmosphere shone intensely as they "cut the sky." But if the reentry had happened a few minutes later, we would have a tragedy, as the fall would be in the urban area of ​​Rio de Janeiro and not in the ocean.
